product_name: Partners West The Lodge Cast Iron Cookbook: A Treasury of Timeless, Delicious Recipes
long_description: The Lodge Cast Iron Cookbook will become an instant favorite with fantastic recipes and excerpts featuring personal stories of how cast iron skillets can become part of family histories.
